line_2: The iron breast of HADES to resign
And high refulgent on the female line,

line_1: Enrich'd by Peers, advanc'd by Caroline!
line_2: Immortal Bard! thou Fav'rite of the Nine!

line_1: With glorious GEORGE, and beauteous CAROLINE!
line_2: And may'st Thou there in pure Devotions join,
Resolves to raise the drooping Nine;

line_1: He'll be the Care of Caroline.
line_2: Content that tender Heart of thine:

line_1: Till Royal GEORGE, and Heav'nly CAROLINE,
line_2: Bid Nature in harmonious Lustre shine;
